alert.note: Alert for Chambers; Coastal Galveston; Coastal Harris; Inland Galveston; Inland Harris; Southern Liberty (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 4:11PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Galveston, northwestern Chambers, south central Liberty and southeastern Harris Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 411 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Texas City. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Southeastern Pasadena, northeastern League City, Baytown, Texas City, La Porte, Dickinson, La Marque, Santa Fe, Seabrook, Beach City, Kemah, Highlands, Barrett, Mont Belvieu, Taylor Lake Village, El Lago, Shoreacres, Old River-Winfree, Clear Lake Shores and Cove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Chambers; Coastal Galveston; Coastal Harris; Inland Galveston; Inland Harris; Southern Liberty
